Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website for detailed information:
  <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samurai_7" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samurai_7</a>

The Viridian Collection contains all 7 volumes of the series inspired by Akira Kurosawa's Seven Samurai.

Samurai 7 is set in a futuristic world that has just seen the end of a massive war, many villages are being terrorized by Nobuseri bandits.
 The Nobuseri are no normal bandits. They were once men, but during the war they modifed themselves with machines to become living weapons and now apprear as more machine than man.
 A group of villagers decide to hire samurai to protect their village. These men of valor are as skilled as they are unique.
